channel.title: Vipassana Meditation on Jiten Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in Vipassana Meditation on Jiten Agarwal

item.title: You Should Do This After Coming Back From Vipassana
item.description: So, you have completed the arduous 10-day Vipassana course and now you are all set to bear fruits of Vipassana in real life. But you know it, you can only benefit from the Vipassana practice if you consciously and continuously plug Vipassana in your everyday life. It would be unwise to assume that you will benefit from Vipassana by just completing the 10-day course and not following up on the practice.
